[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1600757801198{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”4281″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Ywashun machinery” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:50|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

The leader in this
Industry in China

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our packaging department is focusing on a broad range of PET preform molding systems, closure moulding production line, stretch blow moulding equipments, and extrusion blow moulding machines.
Injection mold department is dedicated in various plastic mould, such as the molds for automobiles, pallet, crate.WASHUNservices to the global plastics industry.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1600395048312{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #efefef !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

1969

Humble beginnings

The company has high-precision CNC machine tools and processing centers, advanced equipment and testing instruments, sophisticated technology and a strict and complete quality management system
1995

New headquarters

gathers professional and technical elites and leading technology teams to make full use of new technologies and new processes , New materials ensure product stability and reliability.
2020

World wide coverage

Each MEG blow molding machine is manufactured and assembled in accordance with standardization to ensure the unity of parts, the stability of the machine, simple operation and easy maintenance. The production of all machines, molds and parts are strictly controlled in accordance with ISO international quality management system standards to ensure stable and excellent quality.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3756″ img_size=”full”][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”3758″ img_size=”full”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600757712496{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3744″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

OUR PROJECTS

[vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]The Principal of providing meticulous customize services to every customer by considering all aspects of requirements from product optimization and effectiveness in mould to manufacturing costs.[/vc_column_text][vc_media_grid element_width=”6″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1659770040137-c27855f3-92dd-9″ include=”3763,3759″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1600757297118{background-color: #dddddd !important;}”][vc_column]

OUR CLIENTS

[vc_empty_space]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600758553985{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Goal” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

Help our customers improve their production efficiency and profitability. The purpose of our products, expertise and high-quality services is to maximize our customers in terms of performance, quality, safety, flexibility and overall economy.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Team” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

After decades’ exertion and development,WASHUNhas established a team of experienced designer and workers, a group of educated executive personnel. All of those factors permit our customer sound price and the most reliable service.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Service” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

Mega’ products contain the service notion at the beginning of design and sale is only a beginning of servicing customers.WASHUN takes users as a center and strengthens every service items to fully carry out “customer satisfaction engineering”and make every customer perfect satisfaction.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

LOCATION
Xiayangao,Yanjiang Town,Linhai City, Zhejiang Province, China
EMAIL
washun.m@hotmail.com
PHONE
+86 15158966554
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-up” color=”black” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.megamachinery.com%2Fabout-us-2%2F”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
